heading: Look at Gaming #95
special_insights:
‼️ SPECIAL INSIGHTS 👀
powered by AppMagic.rocks 😎
Did you know that the battle royale genre actually started as a PUBG mod?  KRAFTON, publisher of PUBG Mobile is rocking strong with lifetime rev of $407M and 109M downloads.  Japan has the highest revenue of $260M but India has the highest downloads of 64M.
